item.title: MacVim snapshot-153
item.description:
Vim patch 8.1.577

Targets macOS 10.8+

Features:

  • The option to automatically download and install updates is now exposed in the preference panel. This gives you a way to uncheck it, as previously there was no user-visible way to do so once it’s checked. #816

Fixes:

  • Title bar is no longer transparent in 10.12 Sierra #805
  • Fixed ‘transparency’ setting not working properly in Mojave #805
  • Fixed setting ‘fullscreen’ in vimrc leading to black screen in 10.14 Mojave if non-native fullscreen is used #811
  • Fixed showing all black if MMUseCGLayerAlways is set in 10.14 Mojave #811
  • Fixed misconfigured Python paths in default vimrc #812

Script interfaces have compatibility with these versions:

  • Lua 5.3
  • Perl 5.18
  • Python2 2.7
  • Python3 3.7
  • Ruby 2.5
